question: Which of the following were the recommendations of the Dinesh Goswami Committee?
option1: The constitution of state-level election commissions
option2: List System of election to the Lok Sabha
option4: a ban on the candidature of independent candidates in the parliamentary elections
explanation: Changes in the voting pattern and shift to proportional representation of the list system, instead of present voting system should be made (However, this matter was to be further discussed amongst exports).
